00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # pygame + PyOpenGL version of Nehe's OpenGL lesson10
00003 # Paul Furber 2001 - m@verick.co.za
00004 
00005 import os, random
00006 from string import split
00007 from math import sin, cos
00008 from OpenGL.GL import *
00009 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00010 import pygame, pygame.image, pygame.key
00011 from pygame.locals import *
00012 
00013 
00014 textures = []
00015 filter = 0
00016 tris = []
00017 
00018 yrot = 0.0
00019 xpos = 0.0
00020 zpos = 0.0
00021 
00022 lookupdown = 0.0
00023 walkbias = 0.0
00024 walkbiasangle = 0.0
00025 
00026 LightAmbient  = [ 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0]
00027 LightDiffuse  = [ 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0]
00028 LightPosition = [ 0.0, 0.0, 2.0, 1.0]
00029 
00030 piover180 = 0.0174532925
00031 
00032 def resize((width, height)):
00033     if height==0:
00034         height=1.0
00035     glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00036     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00037     glLoadIdentity()
00038     gluPerspective(45, float(width)/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00039     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00040     glLoadIdentity()
00041 
00042 def init():
00043     global lookupdown, walkbias, walkbiasangle
00044     
00045     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D)
00046     load_textures()
00047     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00048     glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00049     glClearDepth(1.0)
00050     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00051     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00052     glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
00053     glLightfv( GL_LIGHT1, GL_AMBIENT, LightAmbient )
00054     glLightfv( GL_LIGHT1, GL_DIFFUSE, LightDiffuse )
00055     glLightfv( GL_LIGHT1, GL_POSITION, LightPosition )
00056     glEnable( GL_LIGHT1 )
00057     lookupdown    = 0.0
00058     walkbias      = 0.0
00059     walkbiasangle = 0.0
00060     glColor4f( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.5)
00061 
00062 
00063 def load_textures():
00064     global textures
00065     
00066     texturefile = os.path.join('data','mud.bmp')
00067     textureSurface = pygame.image.load(texturefile)
00068     textureData = pygame.image.tostring(textureSurface, "RGBX", 1)
00069 
00070     textures = glGenTextures(3)
00071     
00072     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[0])
00073     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST)
00074     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST)
00075     glTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(), 0,
00076                   GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData )
00077     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[1])
00078     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR)
00079     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR)
00080     glTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(), 0,
00081                   GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData )
00082     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[2])
00083     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST)
00084     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR)
00085     glTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(), 0,
00086                   GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData )
00087     gluBuild2DMipmaps( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(),
00088                        GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData );
00089 
00090 def setup_world():
00091     global tris
00092     verts = 0
00093     tri = []
00094     
00095     f = open(os.path.join("data", "world.txt"))
00096     lines = f.readlines()
00097     f.close()
00098     for line in lines:
00099         vals = split(line)
00100         if len(vals) != 5:
00101             continue
00102         if vals[0] == '//':
00103             continue
00104         
00105         vertex = []
00106         for val in vals:
00107             vertex.append(float(val))
00108         tri.append(vertex)
00109         verts += 1
00110         if (verts == 3):
00111             tris.append(tri)
00112             tri = []
00113             verts = 0
00114 
00115 def draw():
00116     global xpos, zpos, yrot, walkbias, lookupdown
00117     global textures, filter, tris
00118 
00119     xtrans = -xpos
00120     ztrans = -zpos
00121     ytrans = -walkbias-0.25
00122     sceneroty=360.0-yrot
00123 
00124     glClear( GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT )
00125     glLoadIdentity()
00126     glRotatef( lookupdown, 1.0, 0.0 , 0.0 )
00127     glRotatef( sceneroty, 0.0, 1.0 , 0.0 )
00128     glTranslatef( xtrans, ytrans, ztrans )
00129     glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[filter] )
00130 
00131     for tri in tris:
00132         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES)
00133         glNormal3f( 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
00134         
00135         glTexCoord2f(tri[0][3], tri[0][4])
00136         glVertex3f(tri[0][0], tri[0][1], tri[0][2])
00137 
00138         glTexCoord2f(tri[1][3], tri[1][4])
00139         glVertex3f(tri[1][0], tri[1][1], tri[1][2])
00140 
00141         glTexCoord2f(tri[2][3], tri[2][4])
00142         glVertex3f(tri[2][0], tri[2][1], tri[2][2])
00143 
00144         glEnd()
00145 
00146 def handle_keys(key):
00147     global xpos, zpos, yrot, filter
00148     global piover180, walkbiasangle, walkbias
00149     
00150     if key==K_ESCAPE:
00151         return 0
00152 
00153     if key==K_f:
00154         filter +=1
00155         if filter == 3:
00156             filter = 0
00157     if key==K_RIGHT:
00158         yrot -= 1.5
00159     if key==K_LEFT:
00160         yrot += 1.5
00161     if key==K_UP:
00162         xpos -= sin( yrot * piover180 ) * 0.05
00163         zpos -= cos( yrot * piover180 ) * 0.05
00164         if ( walkbiasangle >= 359.0 ):
00165             walkbiasangle = 0.0
00166         else:
00167             walkbiasangle += 10.0
00168         walkbias = sin( walkbiasangle * piover180 ) / 20.0
00169     if key==K_DOWN:
00170         xpos += sin( yrot * piover180 ) * 0.05
00171         zpos += cos( yrot * piover180 ) * 0.05
00172         if ( walkbiasangle <= 1.0 ):
00173             walkbiasangle = 359.0
00174         else:
00175             walkbiasangle -= 10.0
00176         walkbias = sin( walkbiasangle * piover180 ) / 20.0
00177 
00178     return 1
00179 
00180 def main():
00181 
00182     global surface
00183 
00184     video_flags = OPENGL|DOUBLEBUF
00185     
00186     pygame.init()
00187     surface = pygame.display.set_mode((640,480), video_flags)
00188     pygame.key.set_repeat(100,0)
00189 
00190     random.seed()
00191     resize((640,480))
00192     init()
00193     setup_world()
00194 
00195     frames = 0
00196     done = 0
00197     ticks = pygame.time.get_ticks()
00198     while not done:
00199         while 1:
00200             event = pygame.event.poll()
00201             if event.type == NOEVENT:
00202                 break
00203             if event.type == KEYDOWN:
00204                 if handle_keys(event.key) == 0:
00205                     done = 1
00206             if event.type == QUIT:
00207                 done = 1
00208         
00209         draw()
00210         pygame.display.flip()
00211         frames += 1
00212 
00213 
00214     print "fps:  %d" % ((frames*1000)/(pygame.time.get_ticks()-ticks))
00215 
00216 
00217 if __name__ == '__main__': main()
